attributes.action: make teaching training for university lecturers compulsory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students are getting frustrated with lecturers that cannot teach their modules.  They may be able to bring money to the university through their research but not addressing the students, only their laptop screens makes it hard for students (who are paying in excess of £3000 a year) to understand what is trying to be taught.
